channel.title: Have a look at my Portfolio on Aishwarya Harpale | Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Have a look at my Portfolio on Aishwarya Harpale | Portfolio

item.title: Low Powered Models For Disease Detection
item.description: Working under LibreHealth organization for Low Powered Models for Disease Detection and Classification for Radiology Images. Experimenting on models such as DenseNet, Inception, etc. Using quantization and pruning techniques to improve model performance in terms of latency, memory usage and power consumption and emulating it on ARM devices using Qemu emulator and Docker.

item.title: Explainable AI For Healthcare And Finance
item.description: Research in the field of Explainable AI and Interpretable Machine Learning. Identified biases in models trained on healthcare (Breast Cancer Prediction) and financial risk assessment (Home Credit Default Risk Prediction) datasets.

item.title: Chest-XRay Classification and Localization
item.description: Developed a system for classifying Chest-XRay images into 14 classes using DenseNet, Resnet and VGG. Used localization techniques to draw bounding boxes over the affected sections of images.

item.title: Plant Disease Detection Using An IoT Device
item.description: Developed a system in collaboration with PICT Affordable Agriculture Lab that could identify diseases in crops using images of leaves. Developed a custom model using CNNs and deployed this model on a Raspberry Pi device for realtime predictions.

item.title: Book Vendor
item.description: Developed an Android app to sell and purchase second-hand university books from students. Included various features like user authentication, payment module and texting module. App was integrated with Firebase cloud services.

item.title: Web Portfolio
item.description: This Website. Head to my Github for the source code!
